website_summaries.verdict: High-resolution model offers the hunter an extensive and remarkably impressive range of features.
pros: 640 x 480 image capture with super-smooth zoom and WiFi capability so you can stream video to tablet or TV and record to internal SD card
Recoil-activated video starts automatically when you fire
Ballistic calculator provides distance to target, angle, wind, temperature, and humidity
cons: Software is buggy, and instructions could be clearer

customer_reviews.title: HORRIBLE
customer_reviews.text: The instructions are vague. Bought this with the ABL laser rangefinder, but cannot get it to zero because the laser is not visible at 20 yards. I can see it on objects maybe 10 yards away but not much farther away than that. the laser is so weak that it is imperceptible to the naked eye. Tried calling customer support, but they put me on hold for 30 minutes. It was nice they announced the wait time, but when by time came up after 30 minutes it went straight to a voicemail that was full. Seriously? The product may be great, but the tech support sucks and so far a miserable experience.
customer_reviews.author: Russian Studies

customer_reviews.title: Only worked for about Two Hours.
customer_reviews.text: Got the scope 11/30/18 and had to ship it back 12/1/18. Scope only worked for Two Hours or so. It turned itself off and would not come back on no matter what and it was on the charger all night. Shipped it back and will be switching to the Pulsar Trail.
customer_reviews.author: a2lineman

customer_reviews.title: Very good item. Excellent quality/price.
customer_reviews.text: Resolution is awe inspiring!!! One shot zero is awesome. Truly does work. I used a hand warmer as the target. Worked great. Used it during the day in heavy brush and could identify different animals that I could not see with the naked eye 50-75 yards away. Could clearly see turkeys, deer and hogs walking in heavy cover!!!! I t was nothing short of amazing!! Thermal imaging at long range 500 plus yards was equally impressive. Clearly identify animals crossing trails that I would have never seen with my naked eye.
customer_reviews.author: thodua

customer_reviews.title: ATN Service department not so much!
customer_reviews.text: Thor 4 2.5x and 4x 640 are fantastic when they are working. The 4X after only one hunt has started having battery problems indicating a full battery then it will pop up battery low and turn off I did do all the update. Oh and ATN will not answer or return my message voice or Email. If you buy this I think you might be own your own or let me say 50/50 chance.
customer_reviews.author: Mtrunk

customer_reviews.title: Great scope, worth every penny.
customer_reviews.text: This scope is insane. Got it in the mail one afternoon, put it on my rifle, sighted it in, and within 3-4 hours of receiving the scope I had coyotes on the ground. Sometimes didn’t even have to call, just scanned the field and saw them. Main thing to know about the scope is read the directions carefully and be patient in learning it. Doesn’t take long but be patient, it’s a piece of cake using afterwards.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't hesitate getting an ATN scope!
customer_reviews.text: Can't beat the quality you get for the price of these ATN thermal scopes. I love my scope and have done a number on hogs with it already in the first month of having it. The video feature is awesome. You get to show all your friends and family your hunts so they can see what it's all about. ATN scopes come with features you can't get with the bigger price range optics. Customer service is top notch too. Had a small issue with my scope and Oliver Vallero took care of me in a matter of minutes. This is my 3rd ATN scope and I definitely recommend you trying them out.
customer_reviews.author: Greg S

customer_reviews.title: Much more value than expense
customer_reviews.text: Having the X Sight II I was familiar with how ATN menus and options work. However this has been enhanced greatly. Was able to mount and sight within a few minutes and was able to save profiles for different firearms and verified they held Zero. Looking forward to using this more. Picture quality in the woods was amazing and definitely worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: JOSEPH H HUMPHRIES

customer_reviews.title: Dont need to look for other thermal scopes after this
customer_reviews.text: Packed in a nice box and instructions are easy to follow. Updated firmware and company provides nice video tutorials on how to do that and basic functions. The menu options in the scope are easy to comprehend. Waited till it got dark and WOW! Can see everything in my neighborhood and cant wait to take it to a really dark area. Zoom is super impressive. More follow up reviews to come.
customer_reviews.author: H Benito

customer_reviews.title: Clear image
customer_reviews.text: The picture through the objective is clear and the focus rings make the image better than some of the competitors. Once you go past 6x the image gets pretty grainy though. The settings are easy to scroll through and change things easily while hunting. I have been out hunting coyotes and the gun has stayed true after killing 3. I would recommend this scope to all my friends!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic thermal scope
customer_reviews.text: I love this scope !!! Mounted on SIG 7.62 it is the perfect thermal scope for day or night hog hunting.
customer_reviews.author: Jungle Joel

customer_reviews.title: Great Scope
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to sight in. Has stayed true through multiple hunts and swapping from rifle to rifle. Would definitely purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: Mitch

customer_reviews.title: Not the quality expected
customer_reviews.text: Only good quality pic about 50 yards out. Fuzzy after that. Not as great as expected
customer_reviews.author: rg

customer_reviews.title: scope is easy to use and works well
customer_reviews.text: For a Thermal scope under $5k this one checks the boxes. I have not taken it hunting yet, but will update my review once I do.
customer_reviews.author: AllanH

customer_reviews.title: Dissappointed
customer_reviews.text: The ATN Thor worked well, but the micro SD chip does not stay in the chip slot. The scope doesn't recognize that there is a chip in place with chip inserted. I am unable to update the firmware or record images. I am returning item.
customer_reviews.author: Keith

customer_reviews.title: a very high quality scope
customer_reviews.text: this is a really great thermal vision scope. Very high quality and software updates and sent as needed and easy to do
customer_reviews.author: Ranchman

customer_reviews.title: Great scope for hog hunting at night.
customer_reviews.text: Takes time to setup the scope but is great. Very nice scope picture is clear and really shows the animals. Going hog hunting tonight with it.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Moon

customer_reviews.title: Functionality
customer_reviews.text: Fits nice on my Savage 22 Nosler, functions as expected. Did not need a software update
customer_reviews.author: jjs

product_meta.title: ATN Thor 4, 640x480, Thermal Rifle Scope w/Ultra Sensitive Next Gen Sensor, WiFi, Image Stabilization, Range Finder, Ballistic Calculator and iOS and Android Apps
product_meta.description:
The Next Generation of Thermal Sensors are here and they are Powered by ATN’s Obsidian IV Dual core. Higher thermal sensitivity, improved contrasts, near silent shutter, and improved resolution make the new ATN ThOR 4 Smart Thermal Riflescope the sight to own. Easy to use and quick to learn but with all the features that you have come to expect from an ATN Smart scope.

 * Ultra Sensitive Next Gen Sensor - Is capable of capturing crisp clear images at the furthest ranges with improved resolution, higher sensitivity, and smooth gradations even in total darkness.
 * Ballistic Calculator- Hunt responsibly by making sure your shot hits the target Each and Every time. Range, Wind, Multiple-Weapon Profiles, Angle to target, Temperature, Humidity, Plus more. Helps you determine exact ballistics for expert long-range shots.
 * Dual Stream Video Recording - You asked and we listened ThOR 4 not only Streams Video to your mobile device at HD resolution and can simultaneously Record to the SD card inside.
 * RAV (Recoil Activated Video) - Recoil Activated Video (RAV) takes care of all your worries. Just relax and focus on your game and let the Obsidian Core do the heavy lifting. This scope will automatically start to record a video before and after you take a shot.
 * Ultra Low Power Profile - No more worries about your batteries dying in the field. At 16+hours of Continuous operation the ATN ThOR 4 will last as long as you do.

The ThOR 4 looks and feels just like your more traditional optic. Standard mounting rings. Long eye-relief. Easy to pick up Thermal signature of hidden targets and fast viewing. Yet underneath the hood its pure power. Try it - you won’t regret the experience.
